name: tempo velho
description:
"Tempo Velho" 2021
Acrylic Painting, 18x24

this painting was inspired by a Brazilian song called "Tempo Velho" that salutes the entities of light 'Pretos Velhos' worshiped in the Afro-Brazilian religions 
a bit of its translation 

"I almost didn't see anything, no
I feel myself inside
But the thought
Can't be locked away
So much to lose
So much to bleed
So you can walk
Put on these leaves, bathe yourself, bless yourself
Pray for the soul, give thanks three Hail Marys
Walk the path of goodness and remember
That the most beautiful world is only in tiny stone"

listen to the song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Shq-Tz9YeNc
